Time Off Officer with department-based access control: - View and approve leave requests for assigned department trees ONLY - View balance reports for assigned departments - View all employees (limited to Resume and Work Information tabs) - View public holidays (READ-ONLY - cannot create/edit/delete) - Cannot approve their own leave requests - Flexible assignment to multiple department trees
Note: This group uses custom permission checking instead of standard inheritance to maintain strict department-based access control via record rules.
Public Holiday Management: - Only Administrators and Managers can access Public Holidays management menu - Officers can see holidays in calendar/dashboard but cannot manage them
Assignment: Use Settings > Users > [User] > Officer Assignments tab OR use the "Time Off (Extra)" dropdown in Access Rights tab to assign this group.
